title: India vs West Indies, 1st ODI, Live cricket score: Play resumes, no overs lost
description: Play was stopped for an hour between India vs West Indies due to rain. However, no overs were lost as Virat Kohli and MS Dhoni looked to push India towards a big score in Port of Spain. Catch live cricket score of India vs West Indies 2017, 1st ODI here

title: 'Has Bihar ki beti been chosen to lose,' asks Nitish Kumar on Oppn's presidential...
description: Bihar chief minister Nitish Kumar stuck to his stand of supporting the NDA’s presidential candidate Ram Nath Kovind, saying the election should not become an issue of confrontation.

title: Pilgrims to Manasarovar stranded as China denies entry, MEA holds talks with Be...
description: The pilgrims, who had been stranded on the Indian side of the border  since June 20, returned to Gangtok on Friday.

title: SRK, Salman, Sonakshi and more: Bollywood celebs watch Tubelight at special scr...
description: Bollywood stars Shah Rukh Khan, Sonakshi Sinha, Waheeda Rehman, Helen, among several others attended a special screening of Tubelight on Thursday. See pics.

title: Raag Desh teaser: Tigmanshu Dhulia evokes patriotism and rebellion with his film
description: Tigmanshu Dhulia revealed the first teaser of his upcoming film Raag Desh, starring Kunal Kapoor, Amit Sadh and  Mohit Marwah on Friday.

title: Salman Khan reveals Shah Rukh Khan's cameo role in Tubelight
description: A video of the Shah Rukh Khan cameo was also leaked online.

title: How Shraddha Kapoor prepared for playing a mom in Haseena
description: Shraddha Kapoor, who plays the titular role in Haseena, will also have a mom’s part in the film. Director Apoorva Lakhia reveals Shraddha’s preparations behind playing a mother.

title: Judwaa 2: Varun Dhawan, Taapsee Pannu, Jacqueline Fernandez practice for Tan Tana...
description: Don’t miss Varun Dhawan, Taapsee Pannu and Jacqueline Fernandez in this new song, titled Tan Tana Tan, from director David Dhawan’s Judwaa 2. The film is a sequel to Salman Khan’s 1997 hit Judwaa.

title: Dream realised by working with Rahman: Sridevi
description: AR Rahman has composed the music for Sridevi’s upcoming film, Mom. “When Ravi and I started working on the project, we felt it’d be nice to have Rahman on board. We were blessed to work with him because it has been a long-time dream,” the actor says.

title: Alia Bhatt to play a Kashmiri girl opposite Vicky Kaushal in Meghana Gulzar's R...
description: Filmmaker Karan Johar announced Meghna Gulzar’s next film - Raazi - that stars Alia Bhatt and Vicky Kaushl in lead roles. The film is based on Harinder Sikka’s novel, Calling Sehmat.

title: Uttarakhand becomes fourth ODF state
description: Chief minister Trivendra Singh Rawat welcomed the cleanliness tag  as an important achievement for Uttarakhand, saying all rural areas falling in all 13 districts in the state had become open defecation free.

title: Exclusive Mubarakan stills: Arjun Athiya look glamourous in RD Burman's song re...
description: Exclusive pictures: Arjun Kapoor and Athiya Shetty have donned a glamourous avatar for the title track of their upcoming film, Mubarakan that is set to be launched Thursday evening. Checkout the images here:

title: I don't ever want to do a preachy 'social message' film: Irrfan Khan
description: Irrfan Khan talks about the kind of films he wants to associate with, success of Hindi Medium, and more.

title: No DJs, hockey sticks in 'kaanwar yatra'
description: A joint meeting of police and central forces also decided that kaanwarias who carry pitchers of Ganga water won’t be allowed to go beyond the Neelkanth Mahadev temple in Rishikesh, Uttarakhand Director General of Police MA Ganpathy said, adding that efforts were on to ensure safety for pilgrims during the event.

title: I wish I could do a film with Imtiaz Ali every year: Shah Rukh Khan
description: Actor Shah Rukh Khan says Imtiaz Ali has a lot of ‘Yash Chopra kind of qualities’; adds it’s very easy to work with the film-maker.
